Articles.Content:
I figured I would share some models I've been working on.

The first is a 3.75 metre crewed can basically so you can make a Kerbal Skylab.

The second is a 3.75 metre dome.

I also uploaded a bunch of junctions to supplement the hubmax part. Although I'd like to redesign some of the windows.

Now I just need to learn to make textures.

P.S. Shoutouts to ClairaLyrae and bac9 for making stock like parts and mentioning that sketchup can be used for mesh modelling respectively (Blender is infuriating).

Edited August 3, 2013 by Kous
